website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for carrying around your baby, from newborn to 36 months, in every position.
pros: A large storage pouch is included
Exceptional lower back comfort with padded lumbar support waist belt and extra padded shoulder straps
Adjustable shoulder straps for easy nursing on the go
cons: It can be difficult to get on without help

customer_reviews.title: Petite?  Then not so great
customer_reviews.text: Looks and seems to work great on average-sized people, but not so much on petites. I’m 5’2”, 108# and while this carrier is well-padded and engineered, so doubtless comfortable for baby, the straps are really bulky and neither they nor the waist could be adjusted down enough to my size. So it just never felt secured to my body, with everything loose and constantly shifting. I’ve probably tried almost every carrier out there, and in the end found the Baby Bjorn carriers to fit and work the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: ashin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!  Gets us walking too.  Nice when we don't have room for the stroller.
customer_reviews.text: We are both big people. This fits both of us well. Baby girl loves to rock around Costco. My wife can comfortably carry our 18 lb (and growing) baby. I have a bad back so I use it like a back pack instead of the weight on front.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I love this carrier. We have tried a baby bjorn, baby ktan, lilliebaby, and the original ergobaby carrier and this carrier is our favorite. It has all the features I wanted all in one carrier. It has a storage pouch and it is a nice size. It has a hood to block the sun and to cover him when he sleeps. I can carry him front facing in this carrier, which he absolutely loves. This carrier is perfect for me because I am slender at 5"4' and 125 lbs, and I can adjust it tightly around my small waist. It is perfect and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Babyjay528

customer_reviews.title: ... a nanny and this is by the far the best one ever made
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of different carriers over the years as a nanny and this is by the far the best one ever made. Ergo baby is a great brand and this is their newest model of carriers. Our baby is on the small side and he fits in here no problem. We've been traveling in Germany, Istanbul, and Dubai for a month and have used this carrier every day. It fits perfectly snug, has great back support, and just works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful carrier
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is adjustable. As my baby grows, I can adjust the seat for her. I also like that there is a front facing position with this carrier. Having the waist band helps distribute the babies weight making it easier to carry her. I like the extra head support for when she is napping protects her neck. I do suggest watching some of the videos. They helped me set the carrier up correctly. It is a shame I had to purchase the protective be teether individually. At this price it should come with it. This is the reason this is getting 4 instead of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ew

customer_reviews.title: Dang
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed after corners of the Velcro adjustment straps stopped sticking to the velcro patch. Now the corner of the Velcro sticks up and snags all my shirts. This has ruined 6 of my shirts. Now I can only wear this carrier with T-shirts since it does not seem to snag T-shirt fabric. Very disappointed for such an expensive carrier. Too bad as it is a comfortable and good looking carrier
customer_reviews.author: Stan Rice

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the material. I wanted to return it so bad but my husband threw away the box and on the first day I used it, everything stuck to the carrier. I'm on the smaller than average size and the shoulder straps and too big for me, I'm honestly scared to use it outside of the house and fear my son's safety. I originally bought it so it would be easier to walk my dog while my child enjoy fresh air. Would not recommend if you're Petit. This carrier just doesn't feel secure for my baby. Go for brands like Bjorn.
customer_reviews.author: maite

customer_reviews.title: I’m still new at it
customer_reviews.text: Been using this since my baby was 1 month, she was 13 pounds at the time so I didn’t use the newborn insert and she would cry the whole time like she hated it, but then I rolled up a receiving blanket for her to sit on in it so she could be higher up and she had no problems, enjoyed it quite a bit and I could get things done. I’m not sure what else I’m doing wrong since I’m inexperienced but my back always hurts after about 30 min walking around with her. It’s still well worth the purchase, especially knowing I can use it as she gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and functional
customer_reviews.text: It’s the only way I can get anything done around the house. Baby is 2 months old now, so he is still in the “facing me” position. When I put him in, he goes to sleep soon after and stays asleep. I can put him in and out of it myself . My only complaint is our husky’s hair sticks to it like Velcro. If you have pets, consider this when choosing a color! Overall it’s a must have . I got a Moby but cannot put it on to save my life 😂. This is much easier: two clips and done!
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this carrier
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this carrier! It's the only brand that doesn't hurt my bad back. The material is sturdy and high quality and I love that you no longer need to use the infant insert with it! My tiny newborn fit perfectly and comfortably.It's definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay S

customer_reviews.title: Watch the YouTube Videos
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality carrier, but a little intimidating for first time parents. The instructions this comes with are up for interpretation. When we first got this carrier we were not sure of the right way to adjust everything. We found a great tutorial on YouTube. Once we watched that carrier was much easier to adjust for baby's comfort and our comfort. I highly recommend this carrier if you are on the go or even around the house. Sometimes our baby won't sleep unless she is held. If we put her in the carrier we can still get stuff done around the house while she gets a nap in.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this carrier. We originally got the Baby Bjorn, but this one is better for a baby’s hips. I really wanted one that can face outward because my daughter loves to watch things around her. I wear it while grocery shopping and it makes the task SO much easier. My daughter has even fallen asleep in it facing forward. That’s how comfortable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Gahan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, soft carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, comfortable carrier. I tried the lilibaby and while that is good, I feel this is better because it has more options for adjusting the seat pad. It is also easier adjusting the ergo baby seat carrier and I feel the seat is more padded and comfortable. We used this trough multiple airports and sight seeing on our road trip and it was perfect for our 5 month old. I also use it for work around the house and she falls asleep in it all the time. I got the grey, regular cloth material and it is very soft and I think more comfortable than the mesh
customer_reviews.author: Amelie

customer_reviews.title: Rough on skin and very inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to work so badly. Not only to carry my 3 month old outdoors, but also indoors when baby is just wearing diapers. Firstly it is too cumbersome to wear. One too many straps to pull or clips to hook, difficult with baby in one hand. Secondly at this price point could they not use softer materials where the baby comes in contact? Just 5 mins of sitting in it baby was crying and noticed the underside of thighs were red and bruised due to the rough texture of the materials used. I rarely return products but this one’s going back for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic nightmare
customer_reviews.text: It causes me horrible lower back and abdominal pain but at least the baby stopped crying! It can't be adjusted for petite people because if you tighten the shoulder straps, it squishes the baby. My baby is a big chunk, so I'm screwed. I think it's making my diastasis recti worse! If you're tall, it should be fine. If you're under 5'6, then look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Lilly F.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying this carrier
customer_reviews.text: I had watched many reviews on this carrier and reasearched and finally caught a small sale on them. I ordered a gray since it was $120 at the time be the green that was $180 color aside I absolutly like this carrier. Our baby seems comfy in it, it’s super easy to put on and puts less strain on my back than the other carrier I was using prior. I like that the sun flap is easy to access and snap when wearing it and though our little one is only 4 months I’m looking forward trying out the other caring positions. It’s easy to use and adjust all around!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Even when fully tightened did not fit our 4 month ...
customer_reviews.text: Even when fully tightened did not fit our 4 month old son who was 14 lbs. He sat far too low. The strap across the back is also hard to latch once baby is in.
customer_reviews.author: SuMMit10000

customer_reviews.title: Great, use it daily
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost every day. It's super comfortable to wear, and I love how easy it is to switch my kid in/out/facing in/facing out. Kid loves riding in it. Pro tip: attach a small camping mirror to a string to the side of the carrier so you can check on your kid's face while they're facing out or riding on your back!
customer_reviews.author: Tulip

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Would love to give this 5 stars but it is very uncomfortable and not easy to put on with one person , as well as my son does not like this at all . I’ve used my sisters Tula which he enjoys a lot more then this . Wish there was a way to make him more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Evangelina morales

customer_reviews.title: Favorite carrier that I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I use this carrier primarily for bringing my baby along to walk the dog. It's very well-made and fits both my husband and I comfortably. Putting it on when I'm alone is a little tricky, but I manage. My daughter either sleeps or sits quietly and looks around when she's in it. I love that it doesn't require an insert for the newborn stage, especially considering that it's already very expensive. My daughter has recently started facing out at five months, and it's great to have that option as well. I tried a ring sling carrier but just never felt comfortable or safe with it. I much prefer the structure that the Ergo provides.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good but bulky
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 different carriers to find my baby’s and my favorite and this was not it. This carrier seemed durable enough but I just felt like it was too bulky and complicated to use. I felt like I should be going backpacking on a hike with it. I went with the Tula instead.
customer_reviews.author: Typical Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Poor client service
customer_reviews.text: Ergo got so poor customer service. I was trying to reach them since April because of buckle problem. But got just automatic answers and zero help or normal respond. I'm so disappointed. I enjoyed to use this carrier before it broke. But customer service just ruined all good that I was thinking about product
customer_reviews.author: Maxim Goncharov

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, but..
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that looks cool.. and cost more, so better quality.. but wrong. There are easier carriers out there and it's less frustrating to load your baby. Trust me, a happy baby is #1. Looking cool is #100000. Baby products reviews are hard to write because.. we should ask baby, but I can't. If you focus it on parents.. Ease of use.. 0/5 Comfort for baby once loaded.. 5/5 Cost.. don't really care Ah.. the end.
customer_reviews.author: Leon R. Situ

customer_reviews.title: Love no infant insert
customer_reviews.text: This is a really comfortable carrier. I'm using it with my under 10 pound 3 week old. I love that I don't need an infant insert, so I can use it right away and have great longevity with it as baby grows. I watched the prices and got a great deal, and am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Mammas Boy Happy
customer_reviews.text: So let's just start with the fact that our little boy is a complete mammas boy. Every time my wife moves even 5 feet away from him he starts crying. My wife stayed by his side for 24 full hours without showering, bathroom, or eating because of it. We have a BabyKtan but he hated that one. Now that the ergobay has arrived she can do what she needs to and baby boy is a happy camper. BEST INVESTMENT. You Wil be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Good back support
customer_reviews.text: This is the only carrier I've used other than a sling, so I don't have anything to compare it to - so far so good, however. It's relatively easy to figure out and has good back support, and baby seems pretty happy in it. When putting it on, it can be a little tricky to locate the strap behind my back while holding baby with my other hand, but other than that getting baby in it is pretty simple.
customer_reviews.author: BookLover

customer_reviews.title: Baby and I love this carrier!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My daughter does too, and will hang out In there for as long as we have her in there, way more than the car seat or stroller. She never tolerated the facing in position, so the ability to face out was a game changer! Can’t wait to try piggy back and on hip now that she’s almost old enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jane H. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My little one LOVES being in the OMNI carrier. I love that it is quick and easy to strap him in snuggly (even by myself) and that this product will grow with him. It's and easy and quick change from front facing to facing inward. Construction is sturdy and I love all of the safety measures!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The must have product for all parents!! I love my ergobaby!
customer_reviews.text: I never go out without my ergobaby. It’s a must have item for all parents. I had the old version with the big velcro in the waist and I didn’t like. I had too much trouble adjusting it and it was really hard to take it off. I paid an extra for the new model and it’s absolutely worthy!! I travel a lot and my baby just love to see everything or take her naps on it!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mostly collecting dust for now
customer_reviews.text: I paid the high price as I was hoping to use it for "hip carry" position. So far, the baby doesn't like it. For front carry, outward facing 14 lbs baby, I recommend bjorn over this. Maybe find use for this purchase again as the baby gains weight or for back carry.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I did not care for some of the other carriers as they were too small, made for women or small skinny men. This one fit me at 225 pounds and still at 205 and should through the next 30 to lose. It's very comfortable. I needed to watch the videos to figure out how to use it, but I think less complicated than other carriers. The baby also seems happy with it, falls asleep just about every time he's in it.
customer_reviews.author: owl catcher

customer_reviews.title: Best Buckle Baby Carrier!
customer_reviews.text: I love Ergobaby, I've used the original Ergobaby with all three of my babies and when the omni 360 came out I wanted one immediately but the price was a bit too much for me. Amazon had this one on sale so I had to buy. I love the new features added. The lumbar support is great for my back! My baby loves being able to face the world while out and about while still being close to mommy. When baby falls asleep I'm easily able to switch her to inward facing. Great investment especially if you know you'll be using for several babies!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny, best carrier I have used
customer_reviews.text: I tried several other carriers by other brands before buying this carrier because they were So much cheaper. The wrap style was just the too hot for summer and the basic carrier had me worried about hip dysplasia. The Ergobaby 360 is worth every penny, I use it daily. Watch the videos to figure out proper usage, there is a slight learning curve for example I have to wear the belt higher than my natural waist for proper fit. Once you get it, it’s very fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Great support for back.
customer_reviews.text: The support it great. Compared to a mobi wrap, which I wear with baby inside the house, ergobaby is so much more comfortable for my back. Definitely worth the money. It is very sturdy and feels like it will last a long time. Only con is that it attracts a lot of fuss... I got it in the black color and it looks dusty.
customer_reviews.author: Paulacg

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves the army green color since it’s a ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the army green color since it’s a “manly” color and he loves pretending he’s going paintballing in it. We also have the baby Bjoern, but this one is much easier on my back. The only downside is that the straps are kind of big/adjustable for large people so I have to tighten every strap to its max and there’s a lot of excess strap hanging around.
customer_reviews.author: comp_g33k

customer_reviews.title: Too big for small babies and small babywearers
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how anyone can wear a 7-lb baby in this carrier— my 11-lb baby is still swimming in it and her head doesnt have enough support. I’m 5’4” and the carrier straps are cinched to their smallest, but are still a bit big for me. Finally, the waist strap is huge and awkward. Makes me wish I still had my old Beco Gemini!
customer_reviews.author: Knitty

customer_reviews.title: Great baby carrier!!
customer_reviews.text: A must have, I like this baby carrier a lot. Baby feels comfortable and by back does not hurt! It takes a bit of time at the beginning to understand how it works especially if you are a first time parent. Also, I would recommend to use this when baby is 3 months and up.
customer_reviews.author: Tila K

customer_reviews.title: In love!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Fits newborn all the way up!! My husband begged me to get this from target so im glad i found it here for $50 cheaper. Its really worth the money. Fits my husband comfortably who is 6 foot 7 inches. 215lbs. and fits me too! 32 weeks pregnant 230lbs 5foot tall. cant wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and buy this carrier! The only carrier I feel comfortable being hands free. Finally able to get some work done around the house as my girl loves being held 😅 the minute I put her in and start moving she falls asleep. Great head/neck support for my 4 week old and I love the cover to protect her from the sun. The longest I've worn it has been about 2 hours at a time and no back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby carrier. I read other reviews about not fitting well on petite people, but its fits me great and I am 4'11". Wish I would have had one of these for my first two babies. Baby #3 is enjoying it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy A.

customer_reviews.title: Dream baby gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister and her 7 week old kid. She'd been struggling so much, juggling so much, and this changed everything. took a few days and tries to get the hang of it (two more positions still to master) but just having it as a solution has helped her so much, 100 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Lima

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, supportive
customer_reviews.text: Functional and feels very secure with baby in place. Baby seems comfortable in the carrier and really enjoys looking out when facing outward, no issues with her sleeping facing in. I like that there is no barrier between your chest/stomach and baby to allow for natural carrying of baby against your body.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Humberson

customer_reviews.title: Love the front facing feature
customer_reviews.text: Love the front facing feature, especially when you have a curious baby who loves looking at new thing when you go out. Easy to put on, also gives you some back support while wearing it. I'm 5' 2 and I could reach to the back shoulder clip with no problems. Most importantly my 8 months old loves being in this carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Mina C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good quality carrier
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good overall. Fabric feels soft. My little one likes sleeping in it and it allows you to do something else(typing, grabbing some water, snacking, etc) while carrying the baby. A complaint is it's getting hot quickly. Also the cleaning and drying can take long when baby poops in it. Hope there is a removable insert. Looking forward to the front facing position when baby gets older.
customer_reviews.author: B. Xie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate, just get it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I kept holding off because of price and reading reviews on tons of other carriers but this one was the best and I’m so glad I finally purchased! I use it around the house, on trips, walks around the neighborhood, to play with the dogs etc. so worth it’s $$! And this price was the best I could find. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: McKaylee Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Finallyy a carrier that worked for us
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried litteraly every baby carrier up until now ! When i say everyy baby carrier i mean it ! Even the soft ones like sole or k’tan this baby carrier is the onlyyyy one that worked for us my baby is so comfy in it and i can rest no more back pain ! Also amazon price is wayy better than actual website or target
customer_reviews.author: Elahe

customer_reviews.title: I do love this carrier but my baby is small for it ...
customer_reviews.text: I do love this carrier but my baby is small for it and she is cubby 2months old . She weighs 11 .5 pounds. Other then that I have no other problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Buy It. You Wont Regret It
customer_reviews.text: BUY IT. This product has been a life saver for me. My daughter hated all other carriers and loved this one, specifically because its outward facing. Its awesome. You'll love it. I'm 5' 1" and this carrier fits me very well
customer_reviews.author: Banana girl

customer_reviews.title: Just get the baby wrap instead
customer_reviews.text: Confusing to use. Its adjustable which is nice but it's not easy to really put on yourself and put the baby in, you definitely need some help. Better off saving a few bucks and getting the baby wrap instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Works great even on a big guy.
customer_reviews.text: I am a big guy and this fits both my wife (who is tiny) and myself. We have tried a few other carriers and none of them would fit me. The pads provide great support so even with hours of wearing it sits comfortably. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so shocked with the quality and comfort of this baby carrier! I will recommend this carrier to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Nate Stockwell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable carrier for myself and our little one. I am a larger girl so finding one that fits well & is comfortable was harder for me. Our baby is 5 months and loves the looking out position. She is so comfortable it’s usually not long before she falls asleep. I was a little worried if her head would fall forward while in the looking out position but it doesn’t at all which I am excited about. Material is well made - overall a very nice carrier - worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This will fit me great, but is adjustable so my 6'3" husband can also wear it. It's great quality, durable fabric, machine washable, and will last a LONG time. Definitely worth the investment! You won't regret buying one.
customer_reviews.author: stevie w

customer_reviews.title: Much stiffer cotton than original 360
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it with baby yet but initial reaction is the cotton is a lot stiffer than the original 360. The width is so tiny for newborns that I’m a little concerned baby could slip out. Debating about returning.
customer_reviews.author: S. Haltom

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This saved our life in our plane trip. We were almost late to our flight I put my baby to ergo-baby carrier and put small luggages to her stroller ( hello parenting skills) she was a sleep in couple minutes it was very easy to carry her and manage everything else. Also gives me relief that this is ergonomic for my baby. You don’t think about it when you rush somewhere
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Superb product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and supportive to the baby. Also, its quite easy to wear it and remove it myself alone. We use it regularly when going out on small trips like grocery visits, etc. and the baby comfortably falls asleep in it. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I started using this once my baby was about 2 to 3 months old and now I use it all the time. But personally I didn't like it for when my baby was much younger even though I love it now that she's bigger.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Great harness.
customer_reviews.text: Took my son on a hiking venture, he was so comfortable he slept most the way. For everyday use it’s nice to have hands few while holding my lil guy. Also I’m a foot taller than my wife and probably a good 100 lbs more than she is and we both can use it. This is definitely a good buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Masai Coleman Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Likes Easy to use. Highly adjustable. Good support for baby and he can’t get out Easy to hitch up higher while out walking Dislikes For me (male) I have very broad shoulders and muscle and cannot reach around back to get at straps. Basically I have to have someone with me if I want to let baby out and then put him back in again He can get very warm in it. Don’t expect to be able to run in it - that’s not what front packs are for! Use a stroller!
customer_reviews.author: James Bushell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This ergo works great. My son loves facing out. I have the original ergo as well that I used with my other children. This one is great because of facing out option. I would recommend this one over the original because you don’t need a separate infant insert and baby can face out once old enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ilse

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad that Ergobaby finally came out with a carrier to use from newborn and up without special inserts! It’s made so well and I love the khaki green color, very neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Doxsey

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I can carry my 14 month old ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I can carry my 14 month old in this so much better than any other brand. It helps the hips and back from getting fatigued and she seems comfortable in it. I tried an off brand. Don't waist your time. Get this one. It is worth the price difference
customer_reviews.author: Lauren, NP

customer_reviews.title: He is so happy “riding” in this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in place of a cheaper carrier because baby’s legs weren’t supported enough and he struggled in it. He is so happy “riding” in this, and facing forward has changed the game for him! He LOVES facing out, and he looks so much more comfortable than he previously did. Love the sun hood and easily adjustable/washable design. Would give it six stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: SDBooth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect no hassle holding
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier for when I need more of a structure vs the Solly Wrap with my newborn. I like the little storage pocket up front. Baby sleeps in it while I roam where I please! Also fits me comfortably and I am about 130lbs and 5'2"
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S

customer_reviews.title: baby carrier
customer_reviews.text: Great for carrying baby and dropping house chores... a little fussy and a little uncomfortable at 1st.. the head support for baby could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite carrier! It’s narrow, allowing my boy to get some airflow, comfortable for both of us, and super easy to put on for both myself, my mother in law, and my husband. My baby loves it and at 3 months he goes right to sleep once he’s snuggled up in this carrier. I can’t wait to be able to use it in other positions!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Love this carrier!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier. It took a couple times to really get the hang of putting it on and taking it off by myself but now it’s a breeze. Super soft material that my little one likes to chew on, easy to use, and not heat inducing. My LO is 4-6 months old and loves to be in it because they can see everything going on. Glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cory G.

customer_reviews.title: Can't get it right
customer_reviews.text: My baby hated this pack, I tried it a few times and it just didn't work. The straps are so bulky and awkward and there was no way to comfortably tighten them without my baby being super uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: She had it on her registry and was happy to receive it
customer_reviews.text: This baby carrier was for my niece. She had it on her registry and was happy to receive it

product_meta.title: Ergobaby Carrier, Omni 360 All Carry Positions Baby Carrier, Pearl Grey
product_meta.description:
Color:Pearl Grey

Our all-in-one, newborn ready Omni 360 has all the carry positions you need. The Omni 360 grows with your baby from week 1 to 48 months and will support a child up to 45 lbs. You can have it all in this carrier.

MAXIMUM COMFORT FOR BABY - With its innovative ergonomic seat that gradually adjusts to your baby, the Ergobaby Omni 360 keeps your baby ergonomically seated in all carry positions (front- inward, front- outward, hip, and back carry). The carrier ensures your baby is always seated in an "M" shape position. The versatile extendable back panel can be folded in providing head support for your young baby or unfolded giving your toddler the additional back support they need

MAXIMUM FOR COMFORT FOR YOU - The lumbar support waist belt has double adjusters for easy tightening ensuring maximum comfort by providing the support you need to prevent lower back pain. The carrier's padded shoulder straps allow for a crisscross option, great for a snug fit or for those who prefer easy buckling on the front

DETACHABLE STORAGE POUCH - A detachable storage pouch holds everything you need when you're on the go (phone, keys, wallet, diaper & wipes) and can be removed for easy washing

HIGHEST SAFETY STANDARD - At Ergobaby, we take safety seriously. We hold all of our carriers to higher safety standards than those required by our industry

ADJUSTABLE - The Omni 360 carrier is designed to fit all parents. It easily adjusts to fit different wearers from petite to larger body types. All parents can share the joy of baby wearing

STRONG, DURABLE, LONG LASTING CARRIER - Can be used for multiple years and multiple babies. All baby safe materials. Carrier retains shape after wash for long-lasting use and comfort

BABY HOOD FOR SUN PROTECTION & PRIVACY - Provides tailored support for baby's head while sleeping, privacy, and sun protection

EASY TO NURSE IN CARRIER - Adjust shoulder straps for easy nursing on the go

HIP HEALTHY - Acknowledged by the International Hip Dysplasia Institute as a hip healthy product
feature_bullets: Ergobaby stands by our products so you can carry your precious cargo with confidence.  If you find a manufacturing or material defect, Ergobaby will replace your carrier or part at no charge. That’s the ErgoPromise.

ALL-IN-ONE BABY CARRIER: Adapts to your growing baby from newborn to toddler (7-45lbs and fits babies from 0-48 Months). No separate infant insert required. All carry positions included, face baby in or out, wear on the hip or back. Large storage pouch also included.
THOUGHTFUL DESIGN: Includes UPF 50+ tuck away baby hood for sun and wind protection, privacy and easy breastfeeding. Machine Washable and Made from 100% Premium Cotton.

COMFORT: Exceptional lower back comfort with padded lumbar support waist belt and extra padded shoulder straps with the option to wear 2 ways: crossed or "backpack style". Waist belt can be worn high or low to maximize comfort, especially post C-section.
ERGONOMIC AS BABY GROWS: Acknowledged as hip healthy by the International Hip Dysplasia Institute. Adjustable bucket seat supports baby in an ergonomic natural "M" position in all carry positions.
EASY TO USE: Easy, one-handed slider adjustment allows you to quickly switch baby to face in or out on the fly
